name: Fade Transition
description: Gradual transition to or from black/white, indicating passage of time or scene change

prompt.positive: fade transition, fade to black, fade from black, fade to white, gradual transition, smooth change, temporal indicator, scene change, time passage, gentle fade, soft transition

technical.editing_style: Classical editing, dramatic emphasis, temporal shifts

variations.name: Fade to White
variations.modifier: dream sequence, memory, heavenly transition, ethereal quality, soft ending
